channel.title: Project Level
channel.description:
* important: the czar source that i was cleaning..i stopped it *
Server Base: Delta/
Introduction: Welcome to project Level, we are here to introduce you to an economy server ( No goddam starters, and shops that sell rune, etc ) Idea: Making all skills trainable but like rs somehow, also the economy will be great. No godswords/customs.
Client revision: deciding if 377 or 474
Progress
Firemaking: Clipped All logs light able Correct lvl Correct animation.
Following: Clipped player following Clipping npc following
Npcs: making some of them agressive
Prayer: all bones buryable.
fishing: Most fish fishable
Cooking: All fishes can be cooked
To do list : [code] Finish npc following/agression Start some "custom quests" Add some sort of stronghold security Make all skills skillable.
map changes: Im pretending to do some map change for example removing cities and doing some stuff, altough. not soon because i dont know how. /If anybody has/know about any map editor able to remove Objects i'd appreciate it. [/code]
Some media
[img]http://i47.tinypic.com/20jh2fk.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/1z6tm6q.png[/img]

item.title: Project Level
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“Skyro, post:13, topic:448464”]Whac, you’re obsessed with delta.

Good luck.[/quote]

I don’t see how I’m ‘obsessed’ with Delta, as I certainly don’t praise it anymore. With that being said, it’s still the only server base I’ve ever worked with other than Apollo (which Xythax had scrapped unfortunately).

Read full topic

item.title: Project Level
item.dc:creator: @_s11 s1gma
item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

[quote=“Alec_, post:7, topic:448465”][quote author=Level 120 Dungeoneering link=topic=551361.msg4040607#msg4040607 date=1341597633]
Yes! Hyperion is just as easy to work with as Allstate but it’s clean, packaged, and epic.
[/quote]

I’d hardly consider Hyperion as easy to work with as czar/whatever. Being ‘packaged’ doesn’t affect a server either…

also, allstate is a car insurance company[/quote]packaging kinda does matter, it sieves out the slightly less shit from the actual shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Level

item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Something your comfortable with programming.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Level
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“Level 120 Dungeoneering, post:6, topic:448464”][quote author=strucker link=topic=551361.msg4040491#msg4040491 date=1341587200]

I’m sorry but Czar is repugnant and revolting, with the servers out today it should not even be looked at. Sure there are good memories of going into the funpk arena and hitting a 64 with a meat tenderizer but those days are pretty much gone.
There’s no enimity towards what you’re trying to do, but there are much better things you could be doing than cleaning a czar/allstar base.

However, that is my opinion. What you could do is instead of rewriting the client class from scratch you could package the server, clean all of the dead incongruous code from classes.

Good luck.

what would you recommend me, switch to an hyperion project?
[/quote]

Yes! Hyperion is just as easy to work with as Allstate but it’s clean, packaged, and epic.[/quote]

Not necessarily, it uses a more advanced concept of java and the packaging is overdone and confusing.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Level
item.dc:creator: @Level_120_Dungeoneer Level 120 Dungeoneering
item.description:
@Level_120_Dungeoneer wrote:

[quote=“strucker, post:5, topic:448465”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=551361.msg4040251#msg4040251 date=1341553311]
I’m sorry but Czar is repugnant and revolting, with the servers out today it should not even be looked at. Sure there are good memories of going into the funpk arena and hitting a 64 with a meat tenderizer but those days are pretty much gone.
There’s no enimity towards what you’re trying to do, but there are much better things you could be doing than cleaning a czar/allstar base.

However, that is my opinion. What you could do is instead of rewriting the client class from scratch you could package the server, clean all of the dead incongruous code from classes.

Good luck.
[/quote]

what would you recommend me, switch to an hyperion project?[/quote]

Yes! Hyperion is just as easy to work with as Allstate but it’s clean, packaged, and epic.

Read full topic

I’m sorry but Czar is repugnant and revolting, with the servers out today it should not even be looked at. Sure there are good memories of going into the funpk arena and hitting a 64 with a meat tenderizer but those days are pretty much gone.

Welcome to project Level, we are here to introduce you to an economy server ( No goddam starters, and shops that sell rune, etc )
